about_the_game:
Sidescrolling Castlebuilder. Casual real-time strategy game.

The emperor has lost control over his kingdom! Will you help him reclaim it?



What makes this game is unique is that the castlebuilding is done in a sidescroller perspective which means you build a castle left to right. This causes you to think differently about the way you plan your castle and where you place your defenses. Speaking of which; build walls, towers and many archers to fend off the enemy sieges! They will come with maces, swords, bows, catapults and even ladders in order to break through and destroy your castle. Don't let that happen! Defend and prepare your army before laying siege yourself! Open The Gates! To war we go!
